comment: Yeah I hope not. Most people Ive talked to told me they had a fever for a few hours. They slept and were good. I guess only time will tell
amr:
# ::snt Yeah I hope not. Most people Ive talked to told me they had a fever for a few hours. They slept and were good. I guess only time will tell
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hope-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (e / event
                  :polarity -)
            :mod (y / yeah
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt2 (t / tell-01
            :ARG0 (t2 / time)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (f / fever
                        :duration (f2 / few
                              :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (h2 / hour))))
                  :op2 (s / sleep-01
                        :ARG0 (t4 / they))
                  :op3 (g / good-02
                        :ARG1 t4))
            :ARG2 (ii2 / i))
      :snt3 (g2 / guess-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 t2
            :mod (o / only)))

comment: Hopefully your tonight/tomorrow symptoms aren't hell :<
